titleStmt.title: A breif narration of the truth of some particulars in Mr. Thomas Edwards his book called Gangræna. Concerning one Nichols an Anabaptist, some opinions he maintained to Master Greenhill, and a discourse that passed between Master Greenhill and Master Burroughs upon occasion of those opinions. / By the author Thomas Alle.
titleStmt.author: Alle, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the sign of the Bible in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange.
